name: 💬 Chat Kit
description:
Have you ever collaborated on a file with someone and thought, "🙃...I wish we didn't have to constantly swap back & forth between the comment tab to ask questions"?... Well, so did we! That is why we created a specific kit to quickly collaborate and chat with teammates in Figma, in context. Check out the slides to learn more 🎉


If you have any feature requests or recommendations please feel free to reach out on Twitter to @mixpanel, @ryanevandavis or @markjohnsoncc.
